cause.description:
Women abuse is preventable, and treatable. No women deserves to be abused in any way. The way to eliminating women abuse is to make it more aware that it can happen in any relashionship, and make abuse signs more available.
1. Women abuse is wrong and unfare to any women shape or size.
2. Women were worshiped at one point in history and still should be.
3. No women should have to be afraid to go home at night
cause.mission: To help prevent it and make more aware to the world
cause.name: Women Abuse
